mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NUM, BOARD_PARENT_NUM, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_FILE_PATH, BOARD_CONTENT , CREDATE, CREUSR, (SELECT USER_NAME FROM USER_TBL UI WHERE UI.USER_NUM=BI1.CREUSR) CRENAME, MODATE, MODUSR FROM BOARD_INFO BI1 WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum}

WITH RECURSIVE BI AS( SELECT BOARD_NUM, BOARD_PARENT_NUM, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_FILE_PATH, BOARD_CONTENT , CREDATE, CREUSR, (SELECT USER_NAME FROM USER_TBL UI WHERE UI.USER_NUM=BI1.CREUSR) CRENAME, MODATE, MODUSR, 1 LEVEL, CAST(LPAD(BI1.BOARD_NUM,12,'0') AS CHAR(100)) as SORT FROM BOARD_INFO BI1 WHERE BOARD_PARENT_NUM = 0 UNION ALL SELECT BI2.BOARD_NUM, BI2.BOARD_PARENT_NUM, BI2.BOARD_TITLE, BI2.BOARD_FILE_PATH, BI2.BOARD_CONTENT , BI2.CREDATE, BI2.CREUSR, (SELECT USER_NAME FROM USER_TBL UI WHERE UI.USER_NUM=BI2.CREUSR) CRENAME, BI2.MODATE, BI2.MODUSR, 1+ LEVEL LEVEL, CAST(CONCAT(BI.SORT, '-',LPAD(BI2.BOARD_NUM,12,'0') ) AS CHAR(100)) as SORT FROM BOARD_INFO BI2 INNER JOIN BI ON BI.BOARD_NUM = BI2.BOARD_PARENT_NUM) SELECT * FROM BI
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{boardTitle},'%')
SORT
